channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on Patrick Schnaß | KI Beratung

item.title: Play Super Mario with RL
item.description: Learn how to train a Reinforcement Learning Agent to play GameBoy games in a Python written Emulator. With PyBoy, Q-Learning and Super Mario.
